advancedQueries.query: avg((mongodb_up{} * on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

avg((mongodb_instance_uptime_seconds{} * on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

((mongodb_mongod_db_data_size_bytes{} + mongodb_mongod_db_index_size_bytes{}) * on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet}

(100 * sum by (container_id,host_mac) (mongodb_mongod_wiredtiger_cache_pages{type='dirty'}) / sum by (container_id,host_mac) (mongodb_mongod_wiredtiger_cache_pages{type='total'})  * on (container_id,host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet}
